title: What's up everyone I'm back
body: Just when you thought I was gone for good, I'm back again. No I didn't quit the game, I went on a 2 week holiday. Did I miss anything important? Already saw the darius buff and laughed for a solid minute.

replies.body: Yes I trust Jason and Essembie handled discussing Riot's bullshit while I was gone?

Wait, they're still here?

Sh!t, I need to pay more attention...
I can see you are ironically making fun of us when we're the ones that bring attention to the serious issues presented within Riot

I'm not trying to ironically make fun of anyone.

I **literally** didn't notice you weren't about, and I **literally** had seen f\*ck all from Jason and Essembie over the last several days.

it's a completely serious post.
Yeah sarcasm isn't as easy to detect over the internet...

And yet, people get on my ass all the time when I don't detect sarcasm over the internet (you among them, if I remember correctly).

I understand it's probably a natural assumption for people to think I'm being a smart ass with comments like that, but considering I only actually look at about 10-15% of threads created on the (OCE) boards, is it that hard to believe that I'd not realise certain common posters aren't posting or are posting in just threads I've not seen?

I honestly didn't think my comments in this thread would be taken as sarcasm, guess I was wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=h0zotxcc,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-15T02:33:49.536+0000)
>
> Wait, they're still here?
> 
> Sh!t, I need to pay more attention...

I did my best but sadly people are comfortable with the direction tencent are taking this once great game.
